name: Kadane’s Algorithm
description: Find the maximum subarray sum in linear time using a running best.

overview.what: Kadane’s keeps a current running sum and resets when it hurts the total.
overview.when: Use when you need the max sum of any contiguous subarray.

steps.reason: Start best and current with the first element.
Either continue the subarray or restart at current element.
Track the global maximum subarray sum found so far.
After the loop, best holds the max subarray sum.
